title: On pro-cdh descent on derived schemes
authors: Shane Kelly, Shuji Saito, Georg Tamme
abstract:
We prove a `pro-cdh descent' result for suitably connective localizing
invariants and the cotangent complex on arbitrary qcqs derived schemes. As an
application, we deduce a generalised Weibel vanishing for negative $K$-groups
of non-Noetherian schemes.
